segments.text: I notice the water pouring over the edge of the sink, creating a mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate like nothing’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, but she doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, reaching for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is going to fall off that stool if he’s not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this scene is a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone needs to turn off that faucet before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation is frustrating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
